system.description: It removes the most diverse kinds of poisons from food, drink, the poisoned, but even poisonous plants and animals – turning even the adder into a harmless animal (for it will bite, but cannot sting with its tongue). The poison can collect anew, but for a week, they will surely be harmless. The remaining poison can be put to use as required, since in many forms, it can become the best kind of medicine.
